titleStmt.title: Nine select sermons preached upon special occasions in the Parish Church of St. Gregories by St. Pauls. By the late reverend John Hewytt D.D. Together with his publick prayers before and after sermon.
titleStmt.author: Hewit, John, 1614-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Eversden at the Greyhound in St. Pauls Church-yard, and Tho. Rooks at the Holy Lamb, at the East end of St. Pauls near the school,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Greyhound in St. Pauls Church-yard
the Holy Lamb, at the East end of St. Pauls near the school
